DiVA publication records from KTH with subject classification issues

Source: R/classify.R
issues_swepub.Rd

DiVA publication records from KTH with subject classification issues

Usage

issues_swepub(
  institution = "kth",
  year_beg = 2012L,
  year_end = 2020L,
  page_size = 20
)

Arguments

institution

the institution string, Default: 'kth'

year_beg

filter from year, Default: 2012

year_end

filter to year, Default: 2020

page_size

for paged responses, the page length, Default: 20

Value

a tibble with results

Details

Data comes from

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
if(interactive()){
 issues_swepub()
 }
} # }
